p: From 2013 to 2016, the largest number of patients (4476, 26.4%) were diagnosed in 2013. Seasonal analysis of the 4 years showed that while spring had the largest number of patients (5252, 31.0%), summer had the smallest number (3224, 19.0%) (Table 1). The monthly analysis revealed that while the largest number of cases were diagnosed in March (1949, 11.5%), the smallest number was reported in August (959, 5.7%) (Fig. 1). There were no gender differences in the monthly, seasonal, and yearly incidences.
